{"node_label":"send email to HOD","python_code":"doc = variables.get("doc")

purchase_hod_heads = frappe.db.sql("""
SELECT user.name, user.full_name
FROM `tabUser` user
JOIN `tabHas Role` has_role ON has_role.parent = user.name
WHERE has_role.role = %s
""", ("Purchase Hod",), as_dict=True)

filtered_purchase_hod = [item for item in purchase_hod_heads if item['name'] != 'Administrator']
mails = ','.join([item['name'] for item in filtered_purchase_hod])
names = ','.join([item['full_name'] for item in filtered_purchase_hod])

variables["mails"] = mails
variables["names"] = names
variables["user_email"] = variables.get("trigger_user_id")

pre_alert = frappe.get_doc("Pre Alert", doc.name)
pre_alert.status = "Purchase HOD Approval Pending"
pre_alert.save()
pre_alert.reload()","skip_queue_and_execute_immediately":false,"execute_current_node_as_user":"","submit":true,"variable_path_for_output":""}

{"node_label":"send email to Accounts","python_code":"doc = variables.get("doc")

accounts_manager = frappe.db.sql("""
SELECT user.name, user.full_name
FROM `tabUser` user
JOIN `tabHas Role` has_role ON has_role.parent = user.name
WHERE has_role.role = %s
""", ("Purchase Account Manager",), as_dict=True)

filtered_accounts_manager = [item for item in accounts_manager if item['name'] != 'Administrator']
mails = ','.join([item['name'] for item in filtered_accounts_manager])
names = ','.join([item['full_name'] for item in filtered_accounts_manager])

variables["mails"] = mails
variables["names"] = names

pre_alert = frappe.get_doc("Pre Alert", doc.name)
pre_alert.status = "Purchase Account Manager Approval Pending"
pre_alert.save()
pre_alert.reload()","skip_queue_and_execute_immediately":false,"execute_current_node_as_user":"","submit":true,"variable_path_for_output":""}

{"node_label":"send email to user","python_code":"doc = variables.get("doc")

pre_alert = frappe.get_doc("Pre Alert", doc.name)
pre_alert.status = "Rejected by Purchase HOD"
child = pre_alert.append("custom_crm_note", {})
child.added_by = variables.get("trigger_user_id")
child.note = variables["hod_rejection_reason"]
child.added_on = frappe.utils.now_datetime()
pre_alert.save()
pre_alert.reload()","skip_queue_and_execute_immediately":false,"execute_current_node_as_user":"","submit":true,"variable_path_for_output":""}

{"node_label":"","python_code":"doc = frappe.get_doc("Purchase Order", variables["doc"]["name"])
frappe.db.set_value("Purchase Order", doc.name, "custom_close_purchase_order_remark_manually", variables["value"])
frappe.db.set_value("Purchase Order", doc.name, "status", "Completed")
frappe.db.set_value("Purchase Order", doc.name, "per_received", 100)
frappe.db.set_value("Purchase Order", doc.name, "per_billed", 100)","skip_queue_and_execute_immediately":false,"execute_current_node_as_user":"","submit":true,"variable_path_for_output":""}
